headline: Nike Reshapes Converse With Job Cuts And Turnaround Plan For Growth
summary: Nike (NYSE:NKE) is cutting jobs and reshaping its Converse division as part of a new turnaround plan. The restructuring is being led by Converse CEO Elliott Hill under a "Win Now" initiative. Employees at Converse have been asked to work remotely while the changes are rolled out. The move follows a period of falling sales at Converse and is aimed at lifting the brand and supporting Nike's broader business. Nike, through its Converse brand, sits at the intersection of global sportswear and...
